caption:
On March 16, 2025, Lafayette, Louisiana, became the backdrop for a historic celebration as Houston-based educator and nonprofit leader, Dr. Verna Caddie (President of @leaders.esteem.seminary), was honored with the Key to the City of Lafayette, Louisiana. 👏🏾 ⁠
⁠
This prestigious recognition was awarded in acknowledgment of her unwavering philanthropic efforts and commitment to education, mentorship, and community empowerment.⁠
⁠
The event marked Leaders Esteem Christian Bible University's inaugural graduation ceremony, celebrating over 50 graduates from diverse backgrounds and industries. These individuals have demonstrated exceptional dedication to personal and professional growth, embodying the university's mission to cultivate leadership and excellence. We love to see it! #BlackExcellence #BlackGirlMagic
